package.name: Auth
package.description:
The PEAR::Auth package provides methods for creating an authentication system using PHP.
Currently it supports the following storage containers to read/write the login data:
* All databases supported by the PEAR database layer * Plaintext files * LDAP servers * POP3 servers * IMAP servers * vpopmail accounts

release.notes: * Fixed code in error handling logic. * Added new storage container that uses vpopmail to authenticate users. This feature has been implemented by Stanislav Grozev (<tacho@orbitel.bg>). * Added new IMAP storage container written by Jeroen Houben <jeroen@terena.nl>. * Added new POP3 storage container written by Yavor Shahpasov <yavo@siava.org>. * Fixed some smaller bugs.
